talk_text:
But that's all because the demons are slacking
off, and humans have stopped being afraid of
them. They've stopped believing in God.

So, I'm only here to collect the money
that was supposed to be coming to Celestia
in the first place.

Hey now...
That kind of logic isn't gonna work here.

Whether it will or not, I don't really care.
I didn't expect you all to understand in the
first place.

Oh, and one more thing...
My operation isn't sanctioned by Celestia.
I'm doing this all on my own.

Who cares if you're doing this by yourself?
What do you intend to use that kind of money for?

Hmhmhm, time is money.
I don't have more time to waste.
Good day, everyone.
Whoa! What's this!?

Ahhh, Big Sis!
Desco can't see, death!

Suddenly, a smoke grenade burst into the air,
blinding Valvatorez's party.

When the smoke eventually cleared,
the angel disappeared
from Valvatorez's sight.

Where'd that angel go!? Did she get away!?
We must go after her!

My Lord, please wait.
Our goal is to take control of this area.
I suggest we ignore that thief for now.

We don't have time to make stops if we are
to accomplish our goal, my Lord.
I... I know...

...Fine.
She's probably headed to the largest vault in
the area. I'm sure our paths will cross again.

If that is the case...
What do you intend to do when they do?
Th-that's...

Will you promise me one thing?
If she becomes an obstacle, you will
use force to eliminate her.

...Is there a problem, my Lord?
Are you putting the well-being of that angel
over usurping the regime?
That is absolute nonsense...

...Fine.
accomplishing our goal, I won't hesitate to
take her down.

Okay, then.
My Lord, that is a promise.
Hmm... it is a promise.

Aww man,  Valzy totally fell for
Fenfen's scheme.

So that angel...
Is she really that different
from that Artina girl?

She is completely different.
She was a nurse who would treat anyone, even
those who couldn't pay for the treatment.

To pay for her patients' medicine,
she starved herself and lived a poor life.
Her soul was nothing but purity.

She scrambled across the battlefields to treat
wounded soldiers, whether they were allies
or enemies.

Even when she felt isolated because of
the indiscriminate care she provided, she stuck strongly to her beliefs.

Does that have anything to do with
how she died?
There they are! The bounty-huh!?
Ya tryin' to interrupt us again!? Dammit!

Desco isn't good with them, but she still
wanted to hear the love story, dammit!

So Artina die because she was trying
to save an enemy?

...Naturally.
One of the enemy's key personnel was
among her patients...

Because of that, she was suspected of
being a spy and was killed by agents
of her own nation.

Hmm...
You should've killed everyone who was
responsible for letting that happen, death.
Of course, that's exactly what I thought at the time...

When I arrived on the scene,
she was already taking her last breath.

When I realized that it was too late for me
to scare her, I decided that I had to kill
all the humans to appease my anger...
But she...
null_s

P-please, reconsider.
I... I don't want revenge.

Revenge will only create more hatred
and another war...

I was only following my beliefs and did
as I saw fit...
I have no regrets.

Make no mistake...
It's not revenge I'm after.

I will be forbidden from drinking
human blood if you die.
...This is retaliation.

Th-then take my blood...
I don't have much of it left anyway...

That's absurd! nI couldn't possibly drink your blood
until I've kept my promise!

I made a promise to you!
Until I show you the depth of fear,
I will not drink any human's blood!

And...!
I said I was going to watch over you so
that this wouldn't happen... but...

Hmhm... You're pretty earnest, aren't you?
Mr. Weirdo.

I'm sorry...
I've caused so much trouble for you...
With that stupid promise...

My only regret is... Not being able to...
Let you... drink... my... blood...
H-hey...! Don't die...!

I won't allow you to die without
letting me keep my promise!
null_s

I thought your obsession for promises was
weird, especially since you're a demon...
I-I didn't know that was the reason.
...It must've been so hard for you, Valzy.

Ugh, urgh... Hrmph...!
Poor Miss Artina and Mr. Valvatorez...!

(Tsk...
Troubling our Lord even after her death...
She's nothing but a nuisance...)

Hmhm, I thought it was getting rather noisy
around here.

Did you steal the money already?
I doubt the largest vault in the
area could be cracked so easily...

My lord...
Do you remember the promise
you made to me earlier, my Lord?

Of course I'm talking about her.
I will never break a promise.

However, that promise requires that I defeat
the angel when she gets in the way of us
accomplishing our goal.

I see where you're coming from.
That's absolutely fine.
Hmhmhm.

Are we done now?
Please excuse me.
Or do you still have something to say?

No... no, no. We're done. It seems like
we were completely mistaken when we
thought you were someone I used to know.

What a coincidence.
I actually thought I used to know someone
with an attitude just like yours...

But, you're right.
It must've been a mistake.
...It's been a long time since then.

...We're done here.
Let's go, Fenrich.

My Lord, there's more for us to do.
You haven't kept the promise you
made to me yet.

This angel isn't trying to obstruct us
in any way. There's no need to get rid of her now, is there?
I see. In that case...

Hey angel,  You want money, don't you?
Then let me tell you something... We've got
a bounty on our heads... pretty high one.

A bounty...?
How much, specifically?
Exactly ten million HL.

So, now do you understand?
If you defeat us and hand us over to the
corrupternment, it will all be yours.

Well, well...
That's very interesting...

Hey, Fenfen!
What are you doing!?

10 million HL...
If I could get that much money,
I would achieve my goal in one go!!

As soon as she heard Ten Million HL,
Vulcanus' eyes lit up in an instant!
Vulcanus suddenly became full of fighting spirit!

Vulcanus powered up rapidly,
totally motivated!

Sh-she...
powered up as soon as
she heard the amount...!

I appreciate this, Fenrich.
As expected of my servant,  this is the perfect stratagem.
All is for my Lord...

(...This woman is not her.
She couldn't possibly be Artina.)

(Artina would never act like this!
So, even if I defeat her...
It shouldn't be a problem!)

As expected of my Lord,
you have kept your promise.

Hmph, I'm a man of my word.
There's no need to praise me for doing something that is expected of me.

Looks like this is the end for the
Angel of Avarice. So what now? Oh, that
reminds me, there is a bounty on you, too.

For the upcoming presidential election,
we'll need some funds...

It wouldn't be a bad idea to fund out regime
usurpation project with the money on your head.

Mmhm.
He looks like a serious villian.
...It really suits him, though.

So, now do you understand?
Is there anything you'd like to mention?
I'll let you say it for free.
...May I ask you something?
Me? What is it?

Why is the Netherworld neglecting the
Human World when such a powerful demon as you exists here?

I've been told that demons tame humans by
planting fear in their hearts to keep them
in line.

But you have neglected your duties and are
just watching the humans follow the wrong
path.

Why is this happening?
You have the power to change this,
so why aren't you doing anything?

...That's the exact same question I have.
I'm just a Prinny Instructor.

The corrupternment and the Netherworld
have fallen to the point where a demon like me
is forced to take a stand to correct it.

If it was up to me, and I hadn't lost
my power, I'd easily send all the demonds
and humans to Hades, but...
You... lost your power?

It's a long story.
I'm a Vampire, but I forbid myself from drinking human blood.

A Vampire forbidden from sucking blood...
I see...

But thanks to sardines, even after losing
my power, I'm still able to fight to
accomplish my goal.

It's taken me a long time to realize that
things have gotten so bad, but it's still not too late!

I shall eventually take over the
corrupternment, and teach all the
worlds a lesson!

A demonic social reformer? Hmhm.
Mr. Weirdo.

I'll soon be traded into the corrupternment
for the bounty on my head, but...

Won't you tell me your name?
For free, if possible...

Umm... My name is Valvatorez, a demon
who was once known as the Tyrant.
Val...vatorez...!

Oh! That reaction!
She has to be...!

That's enough. You got to speak with a man
who will soon become the Netherworld ruler.
You should be honored.

Now, instead of wasting any more time here,
we must go trade her-
Look out!

Suddenly, Vulcanus
held Valvatorez in her arms!

Urgh!
What are you doing!?
A dazzling flash beam!

Vulcanus shielded Valvatorez
and got hit by that beam!
Urgh...

Wounded by that beam,
Vulcanus fell on her knees!
H-hey,  Get a hold of yourself!

Hmhmhm...!
Looks like my era has just begun!

Warden Axel!?
You're alive!
null_s

Woman... why did you protect me?
I thought money was the only thing
you cared for...

Gh...! Why!?
Why do I keep seeing Artina in you!?

You and Artina are two different people...!
So why...!?

Answer me...!
You can't die until you answer me!
null_s
null_s

How could this happen...?
An angel died to protect a demon...

...Please don't kill me.
I was only knocked unconscious.

(This woman...
Why did she risk her life to save our Lord?
Is she after our money,  or...?)

(Looks like another problem has arisen
before the presidential election...)

Anyway, what is going on here?
The deceased Warden has revived
and is now out to take my life...?

I could see him coming up to us to polish
our shoes while we're still expanding in power.
It sure is weird that he just attacked us.

There must be a reason for that.
My Lord, I shall go ahead and order
the Prinnies to investigate.

I'm counting on that.
...Anyway, which area shall we
head over to now, Fenrich?

Yes, my Lord. We will head to the most
challenging, upper-level area where to
boss-level demons live.
null_s

The Black Blood Demon area...
This is my first time coming here, too.

Wait a second,  you, angel.
Why in the world are you following us?

By the way, Vulcanus, the Angel of Avarice,
joined your party before you even knew it!

I'm not following you.
We're just headed in the same direction.

I don't mind leaving you if you really insist,
but not until I get paid.
Paid?

You said his bounty is
ten million HL, right?

Then I should get at least half of that
for risking my life for him.

Do not degrade our Lord.
Don't think that what you did
was a favor to him.

Right...
That attack wouldn't have done
any damage to me.

In other words, there are no favors
owed between the two of us.

Then you shouldn't have any problem with me,
just because we have the same destination.

Gh...
nShe is going to follow us, no matter what.
Such an annoying angel...
null_s

Big Sis,
there has been no progress
in the love between those two, death.

Besides, did she really do that for money?
Looks unlikely to me...

Well, I know one thing for sure...
She's gotta be Valzy's first love,
Artina.

How do you know, death!?
Do you have some sort of psychic power, death!?
It's called women's intuition.

In other words, you have no proof,
but you've already concluded that she was his first love...
null_s

There they are! Prinny Instructor!
I'll finally get rid of you today!
What!? That voice...

I thought it was Warden Axel, since their
voices sound remarkably similar, but he's just
a demon...

I'll pay you back for all the crap I've
had to go through because of you guys!

Wait a second...
Did he say, all the crap he had to go through
because of us?

This is the first time we've ever met.
That means...

Oh? This is my first time meeting him, too.
I did mention that this was my first time
coming here, didn't I?

Could this be another one of the
corrupternment's traps...?

It's showtime!
This is the opening act of Axel's Revenge!

Those demons that had Warden Axel's voice
attacked us all at once... That's not
something I'd want to experience ever again.

This is a serious nightmare.
I mean, I know this is all a dream,
but I'm really not enjoying this part.

Desco's the one who's not enjoying this!
How dare you to stand in my way, time after time!

...Desco?
What did you just say?

Huh?
D-did Desco just say that, death...?
Desco doesn't understand herself, either, death...

Ahahaha...!　
I will keep returning
over and over again, like a phoenix,  until I kill the Prinny Instructor!

That's Right!　
I'll get my revenge on him for
everything that he's done to me!

W-well, it's just...
Hey, what the hell happened to me!?

M-my mouth was moving on its own...
This is weird! It's definitely not normal...!

Sir Fenrich,
we have something to report, dood.

I see... So, you fought the
So that's what's going on.

My Lord, it seems that this was caused by a
new kind of virus that has become a pandemic
all throughout the Netherworld.

So... the virus is making us do these
embarrassing impressions of Warden Axel?

That's not the only thing it will cause.
The imitations are only the early symptoms of an A-Virus infection.

Eventually, you will notice small changes
in your body, and finally...
F-finally...? What'll happen next, death?
You'll turn into Axel.

Whaaat!?!?!?
Into Axel!?!?!?

Stop acting so miserable.
You're letting a virus take advantage of you
because you all lack spirit and fortitude.

Follow my guidance and start eating sardines
every day from now on. You'll soon get the
spirit, fortitude and strong body to fight it.

We wouldn't need doctors if fortitude and
spirit could cure every disease. Sardines are
good, but please consider what we're facing.

It's most likely that everyone here has been
infected with the A-Virus.
There is no cure, at least not at the moment.

The incubation time it takes for our symptoms to
show probably depends on our immune systems
and our general immunity against the Warden.

Then we better find a cure soon,
or something terrible will happen
to the entire Netherworld.

Crying over this infection won't
solve anything!

If we've been infected, then we simply
have to find a cure before we all
completely turn into Axel!

Let's go, everyone!　
We'll find an antidote by the time
we bring this area under our control!

Hmhmhm!
Found you,  The Prinny Instructor and his allies!
I'll get you this time!
What!? Did he just multiply!?

No, they're all just former demons...
This is the result of the A-Virus pandemic.

A-are we gonna turn into the Warden,
j-just like them...!?
No way! No friggin' way!

Urgh...
We must find a cure somehow!

A Cure!?
Don't play dumb, Valvatorez!

We already know the truth!
By killing you, the A-Virus
will die along with you!

Seriously!?
We'll all be saved if we kill you?

Goodbye, Mr. Valzy...
You must sacrifice your life...
For Desco and Big Sis, death!

How could you be gullible enough to fall
for an obvious corrupternment lie...?
Enemies and allies alike...

(Damn.
This is becoming rather bothersome...)

(Seeing how he went directly after my Lord,
his personal grudge for being entrapped by my
various schemes seems to remain within him.)

(I wish I could keep focusing on getting rid
of that damn Thief Angel, but...
I didn't expect this to happen...)

Those corrupternment bastards...
How dare they blame me for this A-Virus!?

I don't mind that they're coming after my
life, but I can't abide how they're using
others to accomplish their goals.

Hey now...
Don't talk down on the corrupternment so much.

Y-yeah,  the more I listen to you talk...
The more irritated I'm getting...

Desco is starting to want to slaughter
Mr. Valzy for some reason...

What's happening to you guys?
What's with your insubordinate comments?
Are you siding with the corrupternment?

I think it's safe to say that those are also
symptoms of the A-Virus.

I see... It may be the corrupternment
who created not only the rumor
but the A-Virus as well.

What!? Why would they do such a thing!?
If every demon becomes Warden Axel,
it'll spell the end of the Netherworld!

Control the masses by turing
them into Axels...!
Is that the corrupternment's plan!?

It sounds more like the corrupternment
is seeking to collapse the Netherworld from
the inside...

The big question is, how did the current
corrupternment obtain the kind of technology
needed to create such a virus?

My Lord, there might be something more
sinister behind this.

Behind it or in front of it!
Either way, it doesn't matter!

I just can't sit and watch the Netherworld
fall to the threat of the A-Virus!
We must do whatever it takes to stop it!

Sure, the Netherworld's in danger too,
but we need to treat ourselves before we
turn into something terrible!

Don't worry, lass! It's a staple convention
that an important clue, like the cure to this
virus, must be revealed by a boss character!

Then let's go!
To defeat the boss character of the upper-level of the Netherworld!

Ugh... urgh...
I'm... I'm...

What's the matter, rascal!?
Are you in pain!?

So itchy! I'm so itchy!
My body itches all over!

Whoaaa!
I'm growing thick hair on my legs!

Ahhh... And chest hair, too...?
Aghhh! I have chest hair!
It's blond! But there are only a few of them!!

...The A-Virus.
It seems like it's taking effect, slowly but surely.
Aghhh!

Urgh!
A scream!?
Oh, what now!?

You... Prinny Instructor...!
I'll get you... and... and...!

Krgh! You obviously had some sort
Aggghhh!

Ahhh!
Everyone's turned into Warden Axel!

Is that gonna happen
to Desco soon, too, death?

Then I'll never get back
to my happy dream!
It's all over!

This is why we must fight!
We must not give in until the very end!

Don't forget our true reason for fighting!
We cannot let ourselves turn into
Axels (=idiots) right now!

Great news, Mr. President.
The effect of the A-Virus is tremendous.

It's only a matter of time before it takes
effect not only in the upper-level, but over the entire Netherworld...

No one in the Netherworld will dare oppose
your wishes now. This is going to be a
total victory.
What remarkable results...

Even to this day, it seems as though
I've underestimated his power...

Everything I've done was to save the
Netherworld...
Oh, the irony...
Sir?

Total victory...
You're right...
Unfortunately, we're not the side who won.

No matter what happens in the end,
I accept the truth...
That is my final duty as the President...

Hmhmhm!
You're finally here!
Prinny Instructor!

Hmph...
So you're the boss here, huh?... Not that
you look any different than the others.

Ah ah ah! Don't judge me!
Of all the Axels who are invading
the Netherworld...
I am the original Axel!
But didn't Warden Axel die...?

You guys thought I did, because
you all fell prey to my glorious
Axel Special Skill No.48: Kabuki Death!

Basically, he's trying to say that he was
playing dead... However, it sure did
look like he completely vaporized.

Hmhmhm!
The corrupternment was so impressed with my
special skill that they scouted me!

For their plan to fill the Netherworld with
demons as intelligent as me!

Poppycock! What do you think will happen to
the Netherworld if it's filled with a bunch of
idiots!?

This place would no longer be a Netherworld...
It would be an Axelworld!

Oh, hey! Axelworld!
Now that's music to my ears!
Soon, this place will be dyed in my colors!

Just give in to it already!
The A-Virus is invincible!
So... there's no cure, death!?

Not at all! They didn't tell me anything!
And if the original me doesn't know,
then I'm pretty sure a cure doesn't exist!

Well...
That simply means that you don't know. It
doesn't necessarily mean one doesn't exist.

Mass-producing such an idiotic person...
How could the corrupternment do something like this...?

Is this...
what Father really wants?

...We can't allow ourselves to turn into
Axels right now! I have to find out what
my father's true intentions are!

It doesn't matter what you try to do now!
You can't escape your destiny of turning into me!

If you really wanna keep resisting,
fine!
Have fun playing with my slaves!

Where's the original Axel...?
Damn, it seems he ran away. As expected of
the original, he's quick to flight.

But even if we do capture him, if he doesn't
know the cure, then... ya know?

Hmhmhm! It's a pointless struggle!
Just give up and soak in the Axelness!

No!
Please hang in there!

Desco is sorry, death...
But Desco is...
Reaching her limit, death...!

I'm starting to fade, too...
I'm losing consciousness in my dream
to go relax in another dream...

Ugh!
We cannot keep
letting them suffer!
You...

Then why don't you cure them?
Or are you saying that you won't
cure the ones who can't pay?

Come on, Fenrich...
She seems really worried about us demons,
even though she's an angel...

...I have an idea of what Mr. Werewolf
thinks of me.

But my heart isn't cold enough to neglect
the suffering souls in front of me,
even if I'm in the middle of a mission.

Hmhmhm!
And how long will you be able to keep up that holier-than-thou attitude!?
You'll turn into me sooner or later, too!

Et tu, Fenrich?
...Et tu?

Pardon me, Lord Val. It looks like I lost
my spirit and fortitude for just a moment.

I will be more cautious from now on.
Please forgive me.

My Lord, you must be careful as well.
I couldn't bare to lay eyes on my master
if he were to turn into Axel.

Do not worry, Fenrich.
I'm your master, Valvatorez.

And I promise you this...
I will find a cure, no matter what.

Believe in me!
And the power of sardines!

Sardines or not, I have absolute faith in Lord Val at all times.
...All is for my Lord.

You haven't transformed yet?
Such persistence...
Why won't you just accept it already?

No matter how much you resist,
there's no turning back once you've contracted
my virus! You have no choice but to be me!

Dammit! I am a lady! 
Why would I wanna become
an idiot like you!?

Desco doesn't wanna be an idiot, death...!
Desco wants to become a final boss, death...!
And then...

I wanna become a great demon...!
Not like you,
but a true great demon!

You!
Don't you feel the guilt of your sin!?

Don't you feel anything, seeing all of
these people suffering!?

Well, it's not like I don't feel bad
or anything...

But evil is justified in its own evil way.
I-it's not up to us to decide whether this
is really evil or not...

Hey...
There's no point in trying to talk sense into that idiot...

Urgh...!
Desco is very close to transforming...

Don't give up!
I don't remember allowing anyone who would
give up before the battle to join my party!

Keep fighting! Till the end!
I'll make you a promise right now!

Even if you all turn into Axel, I will find
a way to turn you guys back to your original
forms! So... so don't give up until the end!

How much longer can you keep it up?
Just turn into me so you can relax already!
My "turn" will last forever in this Netherworld!

Great! That idiot has been defeated!
How's everything doing?
Desco's body feels hot, death...!

No!
Nothing has changed, even after the original
has fallen! This means...

Dammit! Get a hold of yourselves!
Where's your spirit!? Toughen up!
Don't you have a mission to accomplish?

My... mission...?
M-my...
I'm...! I'm...!
null_s

Fuka and others have transformed
into Axel eventually!
Grrr...! Look at you guys...!

Dammit, hey you!
We didn't get better even after we
defeated the original Axel!

Your consciousness is still present...
You're mentally tough.

Desco... Desco doesn't care about
anything anymore, death... Who cares about
being a final boss, death...?

My...
My leg and chest hair are perfect now...!

...Lord Val, please don't look at me.
Please consider your loyal servant,
Fenrich, to be dead.

Am I...? Well...?
Am I going to helplessly break promises
again, just like that one time...!?
*sigh* ...I have no choice.

Vulcanus cut her own hand!
Bright red blood trickled out of the wound!
What!? What are you doing!?
Please, drink this blood.
Huh? This blood? But...
Just do it!

Hesitantly, Fuka dipped her mouth
into the flowing blood of Vulcanus.

Wh-what's going on...!?
My body is...!
null_s

Fuka, Desco, and Emizel got their body purified,
and turned back to normal!

What about you, Mr. Werewolf?
You would never accept my help, would you?

Hmm...
So this is your payback...

Hmhm, I'm just joking.
Here. Please drink it.
...I won't show you any gratitude.

I wasn't expecting you to,
so it doesn't matter.
And you too. Go ahead, Mr. Vampire.

Hmph... I'm not scared of any viruses.
I'll force it out of my body with my spirit,
fortitude, and the power of sardines!

Why? 
Are you scared of drinking my blood?
...That you'll break your promise?

You...
How do you know about that promise...?

Oh...
W-well, that's too bad. I wish you luck
with your spirit and fortitude, Mr. Vampire.
W-wait...!

You knew your blood was the cure to the
virus long before you stepped up...
Why didn't you come out with it earlier?

Angels are forbidden from wounding their own
bodies... by Celestian Law.

So you broke the law... Why would you do that?
Was it so that our Lord wouldn't have to
break his promise...? Are you in fact...?

...I did it all for the money, of course.
Please, don't misinterpret my motives.

My blood is quite expensive, you know?
Can you afford 880,141 HL multiplied by
the number of people here?

But... I know you don't have that kind of money
right now, so I'll just have to tag along with
you until you can afford it.

With that,
Vulcanus left
with a wobbly gait...

Gh...
nNow I'm in her debt.
What a shame...

However, we have to accept the fact
that she saved us from that crisis.

...Yes, my Lord.
Regrettably, it is what it is...

I shall take my frustrations out
during the next battle.
...The next battle, huh?

Has the time finally come...!?
To battle the Netherworld President!?
I'm counting on you, Fenrich!

Understood.
All is for my Lord...
